text: Misoli korhoi kasone, ki ʙa Alloh kofir şudaand (ʙa monandi nekūī va silai rahm), cun xokistarest, ki dar rūzi tūfone ʙodi saxte ʙar on vazad. Tavonoii nigoh doştani on ciro, ki ʙa dast ovardaand, nadorand, zero kufr amalhojaşonro ʙiraʙud, cunon ki şamol xokistarro. In ast gumrohii duru daroz
